Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 1% S&U - Sheriff
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(Sales Tax)

Summary:  1% sales and use tax of the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Winn for the purpose of providing additional support for the Winn Parish Sheriff's Department (the "Department"), including but not limited to, acquiring, improving, maintaining and operating law enforcement facilities, vehicles and equipment and funding general operations of the Department.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Winn, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax"), (an estimated $2,015,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), from and after January 1, 2010, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing additional support for the Winn Parish Sheriff's Department (the "Department"), including but not limited to, acquiring, improving, maintaining and operating law enforcement facilities, vehicles and equipment and funding general operations of the Department?

Race.SummaryText:
District 7 Propositions
(Local Option Election)
Proposition No. 1

Summary:  Authority to sell beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume by package only and not for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
District 7 Propositions
(Local Option Election)
Proposition No. 2

Summary:  Authority to sell beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in District 7, Winn Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
District 7 Propositions
(Local Option Election)
Proposition No. 3

Summary:  Authority to sell beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in District 7, Winn Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
District 7 Propositions
(Local Option Election)
Proposition No. 4

Summary:  Authority to sell beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above by package only and not for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in District 7, Winn Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
District 7 Propositions
(Local Option Election)
Proposition No. 5

Summary:  Authority to sell beverages of high and low alcoholic content permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in District 7, Winn Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in District 7, Winn Parish?
